an5.17:4.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya.
an5.17:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanā sīlasampanno hoti, no paraṃ sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an5.17:4.4: attanā samādhisampanno hoti, no paraṃ samādhisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.17:4.5: attanā paññāsampanno hoti, no paraṃ paññāsampadāya samādapeti;
an5.17:4.6: attanā vimuttisampanno hoti, no paraṃ vimuttisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.17:4.7: attanā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti, no paraṃ vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya samādapeti.
an5.17:4.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato bhikkhu attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāyā”ti.
